OrgName.entry: KUMON MATHS AND ENGLISH - BANNER CROSS

Desc.entry: Offers tuition in maths and English. Part of a national after school study programme. Tuition is tailored to each child's specific needs whether they be experiencing difficulties or need stretching. Students need a commitment to attend class once or twice a week and do set work every day. Tutors hold Bsc (Hons), PGCE and are CRB checked. Events include Annual Certificate Evenings. Classes take place at Banner Cross Methodist Hall, Ecclesall Road South, S11 on Monday and Thursday afternoons.
